title: Unit Testing Suite
description: Generate complete unit tests with mocking and edge cases
prompt:
Generate a comprehensive unit testing suite:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Testing Requirements:
1. Test Framework: [SPECIFY]
2. Coverage: All methods, happy paths, edge cases (90%+ target)
3. Structure: AAA pattern, setup/teardown
4. Mocking: External dependencies, API calls, database
5. Edge Cases: Null inputs, empty collections, large datasets
6. Documentation: Test descriptions and setup instructions

Provide complete, runnable test code.
example: Generate tests for a user authentication service
